roleset.name: acknowledge truth

example.name: admit-v: admitted fragmentary S
example.text: The charity admits spending a lot on fund raising, but says that was necessary to establish a donor base it can tap at much lower cost in years to come.
example.arg: spending a lot on fund raising,

example.name: admit-v: full S, inverted
example.text: `` We've had a few bombs,'' admits Mr. Peters.

example.name: admit-v: PP
example.text: Ramon Garcia, the Asset Trust's executive trustee, admits to what he calls ``temporary setbacks.''
example.arg: Ramon Garcia, the Asset Trust's executive trustee,

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Only once we admit this to ourselves individually and as a nation can the true healing begin .

example.name: admitting-n: Arg0,1
example.text: Do the mavs want Josh Howard gone because of his admitting that he smokes weed in the off-season?
example.arg: that he smokes weed in the off-season?

example.name: admission-n: NP only args 0 & 1
example.text: any admission or denial of guilt by Mr. Holmes

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Peter Li , the Singaporean who produced both Sun Yan Zi and My Desire Happiness for Sun , admits that she was n't an outstanding student at his music academy , and that her rapid success has surprised many people .
example.arg: Peter Li , the Singaporean who produced both Sun Yan Zi and My Desire Happiness for Sun ,
that she was n't an outstanding student at his music academy , and that her rapid success has surprised many people

example.name: admission-n: All arguments
example.text: Kemmick's blog entry starts with his admission of addiction to the Montana News.

roleset.note: ADMIT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls confess-37.10, conjecture-29.5-2. (from admit.01-v)
ADMISSION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry admit.01, OntoNotes goruping admission-n sense 2; maps to VN entries confess-37.10, conjecture-29.5-2. Framed by Claire. (from admission.01-n)

roleset.name: allow to enter

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: For example , P.K. Chiang , chairman of the Council for Economic Planning and Development , visited Macau shortly before the handover , and even figures such as mainland democracy activist Wu'er Kaixi have been admitted to Macau on their way to the mainland - though the mainland authorities of course refused to allow Wu'er to cross into the PRC .
example.arg: even figures such as mainland democracy activist Wu'er Kaixi
on their way to the mainland
though the mainland authorities of course refused to allow Wu'er to cross into the PRC

example.name: admit-v: agentive arg0
example.text: the doctors wouldn't admit him to the hospital

example.name: admitting-n: Arg0,1,2
example.text: Previous to their admitting him to the hospital, they had telephoned social services.

example.name: admission-n: Location only
example.text: Their nation is seeking admission into the EU.

example.name: admission-n: Location in pre-noun position
example.text: Her condition required frequent hospital admissions.

example.name: admission-n: Args 0 & 2
example.text: Sally was a little jealous of Jane's admission to the Academy of Sciences.

roleset.note: ADMIT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls admit-65. (from admit.02-v)
ADMISSION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry admit.02, OntoNotes grouping admission-n sense 1; Maps to VN entry admit-65. Framed by Claire. (from admission.02-n)
No instance of arg0 found with noun, but you never know... (from admission.02-n)
